title: A Christmas spectacle
caption: It’s beginning to look a lot like Christmas
desc: If you’re a Sydneysider, visiting the Queen Victoria Building’s Christmas tree is an annual tradition. Standing at 24 metres, it works its way up all three floors of the building, almost touching the centre dome. During the festive season, many tourists and locals flock to catch a glimpse or take a quick selfie from the QVB’s multiple balconies.
copyright: Christmas tree under the dome of the Queen Victoria Building, Sydney (© Travelscape Images/Alamy Stock Photo)
